scripts.build: npm run buildNode && webpack ./src/index.js ./dist/webpack-bundle.js && npm run buildBrowser
scripts.buildBrowser: browserify lib/index.js -o dist/ec.sdk.js -s ec --global-transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && uglifyjs dist/ec.sdk.js --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle  -o dist/ec.sdk.min.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run buildNode && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot --recursive && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.coverage: npm run buildNode && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R dot --recursive && open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.docs: documentation build src/** -c documentation.yml -f html -o docs
